Articles.Content: Well guys, I now could say: SPARTA APPROVES!!
Could of sworn I just posted on 297
its over 9000 300
Migration is still going on.
Holly crap, that accelerated to, like, 5 pages a minute!!!
Hype has gone plaid!
And still no release!?!?!

> 
> Hype +1 
> The engine canna take na'more....

I'll keep her together, Capt'n!

everybody follow my lead:

toniiihiiight I gonna have myseeeeelf a real gooohoood time....
Can anyone help me put my face back on after it was melted off from the HYPE!!!?

^^^^61st page lol

edit:

agghh! Too many postssss
We're reaching a page a second
*That* was fast!
![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) make that 303!
Woo, record number! Now come on Squad,give us 1.0 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
*the time is starting to dilate*
Not even slowing down! lol!
Faster
We need a wormhole. Now.
We broke 300!

> 
> Hype has gone plaid!

We went to plaid days ago! We're now at superplaidic speeds! Hypergridic Factor 3.3!

this thread is

flyin' around at the speed of sound!
So we are going for 3000 now right?
I commented on the 300th page!!!!!!!! so many victories today. I want to dedicate this to my parents and my future grandchildren.

> 
> everybody follow my lead:
> toniiihiiight I gonna have myseeeeelf a real gooohoood time....

Everyone give this man rep NOW!
